Html:
Hi, I am using GMap inside a WPF application on a Windows 7 (32x) system. In visual studio 2012 is my target platform set to Any CPU.

When I try to run the application I get the following exception:
System.Windows.Markup.XamlParseException
Starting the constructor on type GMap.NET.WindowsPresentation.GMapControl that matches the specified binding constraints, caused an exception.

What can I do to fix this problem? Thank you in advance :-)

Edit
Tested the application on a different computer with Windows 7 (32x). Worked perfectly. Have no clue why.

Solved
Updated sqlite. Now it works great :-P
sqlite is integrated, you can't update it easily ;}
Sorry, a little bit of bad language. I downloaded a setup package from http://system.data.sqlite.org/index.html/doc/trunk/www/downloads.wiki.
sqlite dll is loaded from resources, unless you updated them, installs doesn't matter
I know sqlite is integrated. What i was trying to tell in the second post is that it was a setup package, not an install. Anyhow not a problem anymore ;-)
